data.content:
noun
plural ~ areas
[count] an area where there has been a major disaster (such as a flood, tornado, or earthquake) and where people can receive special help from the government (such as money to rebuild homes or emergency supplies)
After the hurricane, the state was declared a disaster area.
informal :a place that is very messy or dirty
His office is a disaster area. How can he find anything in all this clutter?

vùng [có] thảm họa
declare a place a disaster area
tuyên bố một nơi là vùng thảm họa
